entire: Why are you downcast, O my soul?  And why are you disquieted within me?  Hope in God for I shall again praise for His [face-to-face] help.

fragment: not a slave but a son
entire: Therefore you are no longer a SLAVE but a SON and if a SON than an heir of God through Christ.
You will also declare a thing and it will be established for you; so light will shine on your ways.
He has told you, O man, what is good; and what does the Lord require of you, but to do justly, to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God.
You say "I am rich and have become wealthy and have need of nothing" and do not know that you are poor pitiable blind and naked.
His divine power has granted to us all things that pertain to life and godliness through the knowledge of Him who called us to His own glory and excellence
For my yoke is easy and my burden is light
So shall my Word be that goes forth from my mouth; it shall not return to Me void but shall accomplish what I please, and it shall prosper in the thing for which I send it.
I desire then that in every place the men should pray, lifting Holy hands without anger or doubting

You shall LOVE the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your mind.  This is the first and great commandment.  And a second is like it: You shall LOVE your neighbor as yourself.  On these 2 commandments hang all the law and the prophets.
Therefore, my brothers whom I love and long for, my joy and crown, stand firm thus in the Lord my beloved.
And the Lord God said, "It is not good that man should be alone; I will make a helper suitable for him."

If you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised Him from the dead, you will be saved.  For with the heart one believes and is justified and with the mouth one confesses and is saved.
A friend loves at all times and a brother is born for adversity
Look!  You are trusting in the staff of this broken stick, Egypt, on which if a man leans, it will go into his hand and pierce it.  So is Pharoah King of Egypt to all who trust in him.
Have I not commanded you?  Be strong and courageous!  Do not be afraid, nor be dismayed, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go!

I will give you a new heart and put a new Spirit within you; I will take the heart of stone from your flesh and give you a heart of flesh.  I will put my Spirit within you and cause you to walk in my statues and you will keep my judgements and do them.
Surely I will be with you and you shall defeat your enemy as one man.
A man who has friends must himself be friendly, but there is a friend who sticks closer than a brother
How much more will the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered Himself without blemish to God, purify our conscience from dead works to serve the living God
And you shall remember the Lord your God for it is He who gives you power to build wealth, that He may establishe His covenant which He swore to your fathers as it is this day.
A father of the fatherless and defender of widows is God in His Holy habitation.
Inasmuch as these people draw near with their mouths and honor me with their lips, but have removed the hearts far from Me and their fear toward me is taught by the commandments of men.
He who believes in Me, as the scripture has said, out of his heart will flow rivers of living water.
For our citizenship is in heaven, from which we also eagerly await for the savior, the Lord Jesus Christ.
Behold how good and pleasant it is when brothers dwell in unity
Every one of the builders had his sword at his side as he built.  And the one who sounded the trumpet was beside me.
A good man out of the good treasure of his heart brings forth good; and an evil man out of the evil treasure brings forth evil.  For out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaks.
And the angel of the Lord appeared to him and said to him "The Lord is with you, O Mighty man of valor!"
Your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
But you are Holy, enthroned in the praises of Israel
I call heaven and earth as witnesses today against you, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing; therefore choose life, that both you and your descendants may live.
There is therefore now no condemnation to those who are in Christ Jesus, who do not walk according to the flesh, but according to the Spirit.
He who speaks in a tongue edifies himself, but he who prophecies edifies the church
No weapon formed against you shall prosper and every tongue against you in judgement you shall condemn.  This is the heritage of the servants of the Lord, and their righteousness is from me.
Therefore if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation.  The old man is dead, behold the new has come
Having shod your feet with the preparation of the gospel of peace

Then God blessed them and God said to them "Be fruitful and multiply.  Fill the earth and subdue it.  Take dominion over the fish of the sea and over the birds of the air and over every living thing that moves in the earth."
Every good and perfect gift is from above, and comes down from the father of lights with whom there is no variation or shadow of turning.
He led them by a straight way until they reached a city to dwell in.
I shall not die but I shall live and declare the works of the Lord
You are the light of the world.  A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.
And the God of peace will crush Satan under your feet shortly.  And the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ is with you.
For we are His workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand that we should walk in them.

That He would grant you, according to the riches of His glory, to be strenghened with might through His Spirit in your inner man, that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith; that you, being rooted and grounded in love would be able to comprehend with all the saints what is the height and width and length and depth and to know the love of Christ which passes knowledge that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.
By this we know love - that He lay down His life for us.  And we ought to lay down our lives for the brothers.
Let the peace of God rule in your heart
The Lord will cause your enemies who rise against you to be defeated before your face; they shall come out against you one way and flee before you seven ways.

If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask of God who gives to all liberally and without reproach, and it will be given to him.  But let him ask in faith, with no doubting, for he who doubts is like a wave of the sea driven and tossed by the wind.
Do not fear, for you will not be ashamed; neither be disgraced for you will not be put to shame.  For you will forget the shame of your youth and will remember the reproach of your past no longer.
Indeed I baptize you with water unto repentence, but He who is coming after me is mighter than I, whose sandals I am not worthy to untie.  He will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
For sin has no dominion over you, for you are no longer under law but under grace.
Go your way, eat the fat, drink sweet wine, and send portions to those for whom nothing is prepared, for this day is Holy to our Lord.  Do not sorrow, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.
I will bless those who bless you and curse those who curse you.  And in you shall all the families of the earth be blessed.
When you pass through the fire I will be with you, and through the rivers, they shall not overwhelm you.  When you walk through the fire you shall not be burned, nor shall the flame scortch you.

fragment: hands for war / fingers for battle
entire: Blessed by the Lord, my Rock who trains my hands for war and my fingers for battle.

Judah, your bothers shall praise you.  Your hand shall be on the neck of your enemies.  Your father's sons shall bow down before you.  Judah is a lion's cub, with the prey my son you have gone up.  He stooped down, he crouched as a lion, and as a lioness -- who dares rouse him?
The LORD your God is in your midst, a mighty warrior who will save!  He will rejoice over you with gladness.  He will quiet you by His love.  He will exult over you with loud singing!
I will praise you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made!  Wonderful are your works; my soul knows it very well!
There is no fear in love, but perfect love casts out fear, because fear inolves torment.  But he who fears has not been perfected in love.
He abolished the law of commandments expressed in ordinances, that He might create one new man in place of the 2 so making peace.
As iron sharpens iron, so a man sharpens the face of his brother.
Do not be decieved: God is not mocked. For whatever a man sows, that will he also reap
Finally, my brothers, be strong in the Lord and in the strength of His might.
Casting down arguments and every high thing that exalts itself against the knowledge of God, bringing every thought into captivity to the obedience of Christ.
Therefore do not cast away your confidence which has great reward.

Hear what the unjust judge said.  And shall God not avenge His own children who cry out day and night to Him, though He bears long with them?  I tell you that He will avenge them speedily.  Nevertheless, when the Son of Man comes, will He really find faith in the earth?
For I, the Lord your God will hold your right hand, saying to you, "Fear not, I will help you."

Then I heard a loud voice saying in heaven "Now salvation and strength and the kingdom of our God, and the power of His Christ have come, for the accuser of our brothers who accused them before our God day and night has been cast down!
That the blessing of Abraham might come upon the gentiles in Christ Jesus, that he might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith
Beware lest anyone cheat you through philosophy and empty deceit, according to the traditions of men, according to the basic principles of the world, and not according to Christ.
To hear the groaning of the prisoner, to release those appointed to death.
While the earth remains, seedtime and harvest, cold and heat, winter and summer, and day and night, shall never cease!
And they have conquered him by the blood of the lamb and by the Word of their testimony, for they loved not their lives unto death.
Write the vision and make it plain on tablets, that he may run who reads it.

God raised us up together and made us sit together in the heavenly places with Christ Jesus, far above all principality and power and might and dominion and above every name that is named not only in this age, but also in that which is to come.
For as the body is one and has many members, but all the members of that one body, being many, are one body, so also is Christ.
Follow Me and I will make you fishers of men.
Let us therefore come boldly before before the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy and find grace to help in time of need.
A good man leaves an inheritance to his children's children and the wealth of the sinner is stored up for the righteous.
The rich rules over the poor and the borrower is slave to the lender.
You are of God, little children, and have overcome them because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
Those who are well have no need of a physician, but those who are sick.  I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
Isaac sowed in that land in the year of famine and reaped a hundred fold and the Lord blessed him.

Everyone who hears these words of mine and does them will be like a wise man who built his house on the rock.  And the rains fell and the floods came and the winds blew and beat on that house but it did not fall because it had been founded on the rock.

fragment: do not forbid speaking in tongues
entire: Therefore, brothers, desire earnestly to prophecy and do not forbid speaking in tongues.

If a man says "I love God" and hates his brother (or ignores him or is apathetic towards him), he is a liar; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God whom he has not seen?
Ask and it will be given to you.  Seek and you will find.  Knock and it will be opened to you.
God sets the lonely in families.  He brings out those who are bound into prosperity, but the rebellious dwell in a parched land.
If you can believe, all things are possible to him who believes.

Therefore, since we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses, let us also lay aside every weight, and sin which clings so closely, and let us run with endurance the race that is set before us, looking to Jesus, the founder and perfector of our faith, who for the joy that was set before Him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is seated at the right hand of the throne of God.
I have been crucified with Christ; it is no longer I who live but Christ who lvies in me; and the life I live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God who loved me and gave Himself for me.
But you were washed, you were sanctified, you were justified, in the name of the Lord Jesus and by the Spirit of our God.
All scripture is God-breathed and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work.
Whoever believes in Him will never be put to shame.
Yet His bow remained steady and his arms and hands were made strong and active by the hands of the mighty God of Jacob.  From there is the shepherd, the stone of Israel.
Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God?  You were bought with a price!  So glorify God in your body!

And I will ask the Father and He will give you another helper that He may abide with you forever -- the Spirit of truth, whom the world cannot receive, because it neither sees Him nor knows Him.  But you know Him, for He dwells with you and will be in you.
To open the blind eyes, to bring out prisoners from the prison, those who sit in darkness from the prison house.

Have faith in God!  For assuredly I say to you, whoever says to this mountain, "Be removed and cast into the sea" and does not doubt in his heart but believes that those things he says will be done, he will have whatever he says.  Therefore I say to you, whatever things you ask when you pray, believe that you receive them and you will have them.
That they may all be one, just as you, Father, are in me and I in you, that they also may be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
Confess your sins to one another, and pray for one another, that you may be healed.  The effective, fervent prayer of a righteous man avails much.

If a brother is naked and destitute of daily food, and one of you says to him, "Depart in peace!  Be warmed and filled!"  But you do not give him the things which are needed for the body, what does it profit him?
As He is, so are we in this world.

fragment: I will give you your life to you
entire: And do you seek great things for yourself?  Do not seek them!  For behold I will bring adversity on all flesh!  But I will give you your life as a prize of war in all places to which you may go.

fragment: hands for war / bow of bronze
entire: He teaches my hands to war so that my arms can bend a bow of bronze.
Who executes justice for the oppressed, who gives food to the hungry.  The Lord gives freedom to the prisoners.
Daughter your faith has made you well.  Go in peace and be healed of your affliction.
Do not be afraid, my son I am your shield, your exceedingly great reward.
Therefore I say to you, his sins, which are many, are forgiven, for he loved much.  But to whom little is forgiven, the same loves little.
The gifts and calling of God are irrevocable.
Therefore be patient, brothers, until the coming of the Lord.  See how the farmer waits for the precious fruit of the earth, waiting patiently for it until it receives the early and the late rains.
As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord
Hey!  Everyone who thirsts!  Come to the waters and he who has no money, come buy and eat.  Yes, come buy wine and milk without money and without price.
As a man thinks in his heart, so is he.
For whoever is led by the Spirit of God is a son of God.
Therefore submit to God.  Resist the devil and he will flee from you.  Draw near to God and He will draw near to you.

For the Word of God is living and active, sharper than any 2 edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and Spirit and of joints and marrow and is a discerner of the thoughts and intentions of the heart
Bear your brother's burdens and so fulfull the law of Christ.
Christ has redeemed us from the curse of the law, having become a curse for us.  For it is written "Cursed is everyone who hangs on a tree"
But that no one is justified by the law in the sight of God is evident.  For "the just shall live by faith."
Whoever does the will of my father in heaven is my brother.
